name: Had a Stressful Day?  Double Meditation CD
description:
Available as a CD from April 2013


Had a Stressful Day? create mind space

A series of six guided meditations for beginners. Helping you to relax, let go and move on. An inspirational introduction to the practice of meditation. A relaxing, soothing, melodious voice taking you to a place of deep calm and relaxation. Each meditation lasts fifteen minutes. This CD contains two CD's


Here is a brief description of each Meditation:

Heal the Body and Mind
Allow the tension and the tightness of the day to melt away with this simple relaxation exercise. (This meditation also acts as an effective preparation for entering into the 'time to breathe' meditation)


Time to Breathe!
A very popular meditation.?Allow your mind to become calm and relax and watch the stress melt away with this simple but effective meditation

Your Blue Sky
This meditation provides you with a very powerful method for expanding your consciousness and cultivating clarity and peace. A calm, relaxed mind is like a clear blue sky

Creating Mind Space 
Purify the mind of built up stress, tension and negativity with this powerful meditation exercise

Calm Inside
Developing a still mind is the most priceless gift you can give to yourself - dissolve all your worries away in fifteen minutes

Relax the Body and Mind (This meditation has a very relaxing background music). Allow the tension and the tightness of the day to melt away with this simple relaxation exercise. 

Download from iTunes here: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/had-stressful-day-create-mind/id345829670

Sample the meditations here before you buy: 

Free Delivery to anywhere in the UK - for orders in the USA please visit here: http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/createmindspace

http://www.mindspace.org.uk/visit-the-shop/

name: Mind Space Meditation Manual
description:
Mind Space Meditation Manual
A twenty page beginners guide to meditation
Currently available as an ebook in PDF format.
When we receive payment you will receive your copy by e-mail. 
Delivered to your Inbox anywhere in the world

What’s Inside?

*A Brief Introduction  
*An Explanation of the Benefits of Meditation
 *Creating a Meditation Space

Meditations

*Explanation of a physical relaxation meditation 
 *Explanation of the advanced body relaxation meditation
 *Explanation of classical breathing meditation
 *How to engage in a subtle sensation breathing meditation
 *How to engage in a purifying breathing meditation


(Audio guided meditations are available on: Had a Stressful Day CD)
